actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the acquisition of additional lands for inclusion in the Fort Clatsop National Memorial in the State of Oregon, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fort Clatsop National Memorial Expansion Act of 2000

summary.text: Fort Clatsop National Memorial Expansion Act of 2000 - Authorizes the acquisition of certain additional lands for inclusion within the Fort Clatsop National Memorial in Oregon.Requires the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of the area near McGowan, Washington, where the Lewis and Clark Expedition first camped after reaching the Pacific Ocean, to determine its suitability for inclusion in the National Park System.

titles.title: Fort Clatsop National Memorial Expansion Act of 2000
To authorize the acquisition of additional lands for inclusion in the Fort Clatsop National Memorial in the State of Oregon, and for other purposes.
